title: Import standalone files. — standalone-import
text: standalone_import() allows choice individual standalone files.

title: Import standalone files. — standalone-import
code: standalone_import(   repo_spec,   file = NULL,   ...,   dest_dir = "./R",   names_prefix = NULL )  standalone_import_all(repo_spec, ..., dest_dir = "./R", names_prefix = NULL)

title: Import standalone files. — standalone-import
text: repo_spec string identifying GitHub repo one forms: Plain OWNER/REPO spec Browser URL, "https://github.com/OWNER/REPO" HTTPS Git URL, "https://github.com/OWNER/REPO.git" SSH Git URL, "git@github.com:OWNER/REPO.git" file Name standalone file. ⁠standalone-⁠ prefix file extension optional. omitted, allow choose standalone files offered repo. ... elements passed standalone_urls() dest_dir string indicating directory downloaded file saved. Tilde-expansion performed. names_prefix prefix imported file. NULL (default), prefix "standalone-" (e.g. standalone-xyz.R).

title: Import standalone files. — standalone-import
text: function returns NULL invisibly saving selected standalone files dest-dir.

title: Import standalone files. — standalone-import
text: standalone-import_all() imports stadalone files available selected rpository.

title: Manage imported standalone files — standalone-paths
code: standalone_paths_get(dest_dir = "./R", ..., names_prefix = NULL)  standalone_paths_remove(dest_dir = "./R", ..., names_prefix = NULL)

title: Manage imported standalone files — standalone-paths
text: dest_dir string indicating directory downloaded file saved. Tilde-expansion performed. ... elements passed standalone_urls() names_prefix prefix imported file. NULL (default), prefix "standalone-" (e.g. standalone-xyz.R).

title: Manage imported standalone files — standalone-paths
text: standalone_paths_get() returns paths standalone files dest_dir. standalone_paths_remove() removes standalone paths dest_dir.

title: Get standalone files standalone urls. — standalone_urls
text: repo_spec string identifying GitHub repo one forms: Plain OWNER/REPO spec Browser URL, "https://github.com/OWNER/REPO" HTTPS Git URL, "https://github.com/OWNER/REPO.git" SSH Git URL, "git@github.com:OWNER/REPO.git" ref name branch, tag, commit. default, file path copied current state repo's default branch. extracted repo_spec user provides URL. host GitHub host target, passed .api_url argument gh::gh(). repo_spec URL, host extracted . unspecified, gh defaults "https://api.github.com", although gh's default can customised setting GITHUB_API_URL environment variable. hypothetical GitHub Enterprise instance, either "https://github.acme.com/api/v3" "https://github.acme.com" acceptable. error_call Defaults caller_env(). Useful reporting errors.

title: Get standalone files standalone urls. — standalone_urls
text: named vector download urls standalone files.
